title: iOS 14 to 15 Comparison Screenshots
content:
Ryan Burnett:

What’s new in iOS 15. Includes before and after comparisons documenting the design evolution from iOS 14 to iOS 15. Settings, Photos, Safari, Calendar, Maps, and FaceTime are covered in 52 screenshots.

I’ve been using iOS 15 all summer, and there are slew of changes illustrated that I hadn’t noticed. (You may recall a similar collection from Burnett for iOS 12 to 13. As I wrote then, Twitter is a good medium for this sort of thing.)

 ★
author: John Gruber
